text: Hi everyone! I'm adding (retrofitting) an asynchronous request processing (first server-side, then client-side too) to a Web programming language (<http://webdsl.org|webdsl.org> to be specific). I would appreciate your suggestions and references to existing models, both syntactic and semantic. I'm particularly interested in mandatory timeouts and error handling, and compositionality. As long as request processing is essentially a FSM you can view the question as "nice and composable syntax for describing FSMs". :slightly_smiling_face:
